My research is primarily focused on spectroscopy of galactic halo stars. I previously worked on gravitational waves, specifically from binary systems.

I currently hold an MPhil in Physics and Astronomy from Cardiff University (â€˜18) and a BS in Physics and Math (double major) with a French minor from Syracuse University.

I have previously had internships at Fermilab, NASA, Caltech and the Linear Particle Accelerator of Orsay.
